Title: The Nokhud Offensive: Founders Keepers
Description:
Teera and Maruuk's weapons were removed before we stopped Tombcaller Arban. Our greatest ancestors may fight again in these plains... for the Nokhud.

Go to the Nokhud Offensive. Find Maruuk and Teera. When you have subdued them, bring their weapons back to the Teerakai burial mound. We will lay them back to rest with the honor they deserve, in a place we can protect more easily.
ObjectivesText: Enter the Nokhud Offensive, defeat Teera and Maruuk, and place their weapons in the Teerakai kurgan.
RewardText: I would never have expected such help from an outsider before. You have my thanks.
